column4: hello everybody, i am considering switching to ubuntu. i currently use windows (vista, unfortunately), and i was wondering, how jarring is the change? i am not good (at all) with computers, so how easy is it to install/use ubuntu?
what do you usually use your computer for?
listening to music you mean?  and what sorts of languages?
It'll be pretty smooth, but I agree with nhaines, grab the LiveCD and try it out.
